MATT 27.53 jah usgaggandans us hlaiwasnom afar urrist is innatgaggandans in þo weihon baurg jah ataugidedun sik managaim.
MATT 27.54 iþ hundafaþs jah þai miþ imma witandans Iesua, gasaiƕandans þo reiron jah þo waurþanona, ohtedun abraba, qiþandans:
bi sunjai gudis sunus ist sa.

MATT 27.55 wesunuh þan jainar qinons managos fairraþro saiƕandeins, þozei laistidedun afar Iesua fram Galeilaia, andbahtjandeins imma, MATT 27.56 in þaimei was Marja so Magdalene, jah Marja so Iakobis jah Iosezis aiþei, jah aiþei suniwe Zaibaidaiaus.
MATT 27.57 iþ þan seiþu warþ, qam manna gabigs af Areimaþaias þizuh namo Iosef, saei jah silba siponida Iesua.
MATT 27.58 sah atgaggands du Peilatau baþ þis leikis Iesuis.
þanuh Peilatus uslaubida giban þata leik.

MATT 27.59 jah nimands þata leik Iosef biwand ita sabana hrainjamma MATT 27.60 jah galagida ita in niujamma seinamma hlaiwa þatei ushuloda ana staina jah faurwalwjands staina mikilamma daurons þis hlaiwis galaiþ.
MATT 27.61 wasuh þan jainar Marja Magdalene jah so anþara Marja sitandeins andwairþis þamma hlaiwa.
MATT 27.62 iftumin þan daga, saei ist afar paraskaiwein, gaqemun auhumistans gudjans jah Fareisaieis du Peilatau MATT 27.63 qiþandans:
frauja, gamundedum þatei jains airzjands qaþ nauh libands:
afar þrins dagans urreisa.
MATT 27.64 hait nu witan þamma hlaiwa und þana þridjan dag, ibai ufto qimandans þai siponjos is binimaina imma jah qiþaina du managein:
urrais us dauþaim,
jah ist so speidizei airziþa wairsizei þizai frumein.
MATT 27.65 qaþ im Peilatus:
habaiþ wardjans,
gaggiþ
witaiduh swaswe kunnuþ.
MATT 27.66 iþ eis gaggandans galukun þata hlaiw, faursigljandans þana...
MARK Incipit.0 Aiwaggeljo þairh Marku anastodeiþ.
MARK 1.1 Anastodeins aiwaggeljons Iesuis Xristaus sunaus gudis.
MARK 1.2 swe gameliþ ist in Esaïin praufetau:
sai, ik insandja aggilu meinana faura þus, saei gamanweiþ wig þeinana faura þus.
MARK 1.3 Stibna wopjandins in auþidai:
manweiþ wig fraujins,
raihtos waurkeiþ staigos gudis unsaris.
MARK 1.4 was Iohannes daupjands in auþidai jah merjands daupein idreigos du aflageinai frawaurhte.
MARK 1.5 jah usiddjedun du imma all Iudaialand jah Iairusaulwmeis, jah daupidai wesun allai in Iaurdane aƕai fram imma, andhaitandans frawaurhtim seinaim.
MARK 1.6 was-uþ-þan Iohannes gawasiþs taglam ulbandaus jah gairda filleina bi hup seinana jah matida þramsteins jah miliþ haiþiwisk.
MARK 1.7 jah merida qiþands:
qimiþ swinþoza mis sa afar mis, þizei ik ni im wairþs anahneiwands andbindan skaudaraip skohe is.
MARK 1.8 aþþan ik daupja izwis in watin, iþ is daupeiþ izwis in ahmin weihamma.
MARK 1.9 jah warþ in jainaim dagam, qam Iesus fram Nazaraiþ Galeilaias jah daupiþs was fram Iohanne in Iaurdane.
MARK 1.10 jah suns usgaggands us þamma watin gasaƕ usluknans himinans jah ahman swe ahak atgaggandan ana ina.
MARK 1.11 jah stibna qam us himinam:
þu is sunus meins sa liuba, in þuzei waila galeikaida.
MARK 1.12 jah suns sai, ahma ina ustauh in auþida.
MARK 1.13 jah was in þizai auþidai dage fidwor tiguns fraisans fram Satanin, jah was miþ diuzam, jah aggileis andbahtidedun imma.
MARK 1.14 iþ afar þatei atgibans warþ Iohannes, qam Iesus in Galeilaia merjands aiwaggeljon þiudangardjos gudis, MARK 1.15 qiþands þatei usfullnoda þata mel jah atneƕida sik þiudangardi gudis:
idreigoþ jah galaubeiþ in aiwaggeljon.
MARK 1.16 jah ƕarbonds faur marein Galeilaias gasaƕ Seimonu jah Andraian broþar is, þis Seimonis, wairpandans nati in marein;
wesun auk fiskjans.
MARK 1.17 jah qaþ im Iesus:
hirjats afar mis, jah gatauja igqis wairþan nutans manne.
